item.title: Israel Destroyed Gaza’s Health System. Palestinians Will Die for Years to Come.
item.description: Many in Gaza will not survive, not because of their injuries alone but because of the lack of a health care system to treat them.

item.title: Hawaii Declares Emergency After Earthquake Off Russia Causes Tsunami
item.description: Gov. Josh Green urged people in coastal areas to seek higher ground, with waves expected to reach the state within hours. “Do not wait,” he said.
